content: this is a simple pixie hat and a lovely pattern that suits both boys and girls it is worked in one flat piece from the casting on edge rib and working in stocking stitch towards the back of the bonnet where it has a soft shaping for the cute pixie peak effect the hat is then folded in half with a back seam the bonnet also has a bottom garter stitch edge picked up and knitted afterwards with two straps the step by step instructions have lots of photos and size colour codes to help you through your knitting project pattern information - available sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 1-2 years 2-4 years 4-6 years 6-10 years - construction knitted flat - experience level advanced beginner - yarn dk weight yarn - gauge 25 stitches x 34 row = 10cm / 4 in stocking stitch with 3 5mm us 4 needles - yardage approx 90 meters-150 meters depending on size - needles - 3 5mm us 4 circular needles - knitting techniques knit purl ktbl optional ptbl optional simple increases and decreases - language english and portuguese this is a digital file not the actual finished item you cannot resell my pattern however you can sell the finished item ©agasalhos e bugalhos all rights reserved if you need any information or have any questions regarding this pattern feel free to contact me i will be happy to help share your finished projects on instagram tagging @agasalhosebugalhos i hope you enjoy this pattern with love sandra
